title: Regroupement s\'emantique de d\'efinitions en espagnol
abstract: This article focuses on the description and evaluation of a new unsupervised learning method of clustering of definitions in Spanish according to their semantic. Textual Energy was used as a clustering measure, and we study an adaptation of the Precision and Recall to evaluate our method.
histories: 11 pages, in French, 5 figures. Workshop Evaluation des m\'ethodes d'Extraction de Connaissances dans les Donn\'ees EvalECD EGC'10, 2010 Tunis
COMMENTS: 11 pages, in French, 5 figures. Workshop Evaluation des m\'ethodes d'Extraction de Connaissances dans les Donn\'ees EvalECD EGC'10, 2010 Tunis
